title: Every Night I Dream aka Yogoto no yume (Naruse, 1933)
description:
Download this torrent (magnet link)

A single mother works tirelessly as a Ginza bar hostess to ensure a better life for her young son. Her long-lost husband returns, vowing to find work and take care of both her and the child, yet his presence only complicates matters in this atmospheric study of lower-class life set in the dockside neighborhoods of Tokyo.
